title: The Dark Lord's Risk Assessor
description: Even world domination requires a Job Safety Analysis.When the Dark Lordâ€™s new advisor requests help from Duffleooffer & Co Risk Assessors, naturally they send their most fearless inspector. Faced with trolls, dank dungeons, kidnapped scientists and not a single fire plan in sight, Janet Higgins has her work cut out for her. But she is the best and lives are going to be saved whether they like it or not.
author: Nikki Moyes
